The Tengzhou Liuzhuang Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in the city of Zaozhuang, Shandong Province, China

operators: Zaozhuang Liuzhuang Coal Industry Co Ltd
owners: Shandong Zhongtai Coal Industry Group Co Ltd
web_search_companies.notes: Zaozhuang Liuzhuang Coal Industry Co Ltd operates the mine and is fully owned by Shandong Zhongtai Coal Industry Group Co Ltd.
